name: trisyllable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a word with three syllables: There is some debate about whether the name "Coleridge" is pronounced as a disyllable or a trisyllable.
More examplesFewer examplesIn our analysis, the definitions of di- and trisyllables number the syllables from the right.The bird's call is a liquid trisyllable "whe-whee-ooo", rising from first to second and then falling again. A disyllable consists of two syllables, and a trisyllable of three. The noun is pronounced as a trisyllable with the stress on the last syllable.
